categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Caille was a Human female agent of the Sith Empire on the planet Balmorra during the Galactic War. She was among the casualties during the invasion of the Imperial Headquarters in the city of Sobrik.
Agent Caille appears as a named enemy in the Imperial Headquarters, a location in the Republic version of Balmorra in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
